name: TheLoop
description:
Game made during LudumDare game jam with the theme: "Stuck in a loop"

You play as a etheric entity that got stuck in a loop and can´t get away. The only thing entity (let´s call it "Bob") can do, is to loop around and try to avoid deadly obstackles.

Controls: button [R] for movement

I have dove few LD jams already but this was my first Compo entry and it was certainly a challenge.

You can rate my entry -> HERE

Please let me know Your best score. 
Thank you for Your time with my game!

Tools:
- UNITY
- Aseprite
- FL Studio
